attributes.action: Use his powers to keep the BBC Message Board open for the benefit of all it's many and varied users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC are going to shut down the present message board in a few months. This board helps a lot of people stay in touch and keep up with many and various topics. These topics ranging from politics to fashion, sport to entertainment as well as local and national news.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
